sentences.en: Administrative staff may be deskilled through increased automation and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 随着自动化程度和效率提高，行政人员可能不再需要专业技能。

trans.tran_en: If workers are deskilled, they no longer need special skills to do their work, especially because of modern methods of production
If workers are deskilled, they no longer need special skills to do their work, especially because of modern methods of production
